title: Why is there so much trash littering both roadsides on the causeways from the Cape Fear bridge to the Leland exit in Brunswick County?  (Was there an accident that caused so much trash to be deposited every quarter mile from the Cape Fear Memorial bridge all the way to the Leland exit and when will it be cleaned up? It does not make a favorable impression on tourists.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=15095
